name: Aesthir Glider
oracle_text:
Flying
Aesthir Glider can't block.
flavor_text:
"Sacrilege! A noble ally in life, made nothing more than a glorified kite in death!"
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Agent of Stromgald
oracle_text: {R}: Add {B}.
flavor_text:
"The Order of Stromgald spreads its poisonous lies from within Varchild's troops, and still she sees only visions of conquest."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Arcane Denial
oracle_text:
Counter target spell. Its controller may draw up to two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
You draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Astrolabe
oracle_text: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Astrolabe: Add two mana of any one color. Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Awesome Presence
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature can't be blocked unless defending player pays {3} for each creature they control that's blocking it.
flavor_text: "At the core of all power is raw passion." —Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Balduvian War-Makers
oracle_text:
Haste
Rampage 1 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +1/+1 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
flavor_text:
"Those mewling Barbarians will cower before my righteous steel!"
—General Varchild

name: Benthic Explorers
oracle_text: {T}, Untap a tapped land an opponent controls: Add one mana of any type that land could produce.
flavor_text: The rising oceans brought new lakes—and new terrors—to Terisiare. The Explorers found their ancient enemies spawning everywhere.

name: Bestial Fury
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Bestial Fury enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
Whenever enchanted creature becomes blocked, it gets +4/+0 and gains trample until end of turn.

name: Carrier Pigeons
oracle_text:
Flying
When Carrier Pigeons enters the battlefield, draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Birds know no borders! Why, then, should we?"
—General Varchild, in a missive to King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Casting of Bones
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor_text:
"Whether whole or not, still we serve Lim-Dûl's wishes."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Deadly Insect
oracle_text: Shroud (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities.)
flavor_text:
"Beautiful, indeed—but one sting could fell a Giant in a heartbeat."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Elvish Ranger
flavor_text:
"No one may fault an Elvish Ranger's heart, but the simplest frailty may fell even the proudest warrior."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Enslaved Scout
oracle_text: {2}: Enslaved Scout gains mountainwalk until end of turn. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
flavor_text:
"Her soldiers' hatred for the Goblins is tempered only by their need for what the Goblins alone hold: knowledge of their mountain home."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Errand of Duty
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 white Knight creature token with banding. (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"Call every able sword to our side. Kjeldor will stand triumphant!"
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: False Demise
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When enchanted creature dies, return that card to the battlefield under your control.
flavor_text:
"Far too many of our missing 'dead' seem to be turning up in Varchild's ranks!"
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Feast or Famine
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token.
• Destroy target nonartifact, nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"We are not yet free of Lim-Dûl's terrors."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Fevered Strength
oracle_text:
Target creature gets +2/+0 until end of turn.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"The burst of strength brought on by this plague should not be mistaken for a sign of renewed health."
—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Foresight
oracle_text:
Search your library for three cards, exile them, then shuffle.
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.

name: Fyndhorn Druid
oracle_text: When Fyndhorn Druid dies, if it was blocked this turn, you gain 4 life.
flavor_text:
"All struggles ultimately require sacrifice. It's just that some sacrifices are dearer than others."
—Jaeuhl Carthalion, Juniper Order Advocate

name: Gift of the Woods
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Whenever enchanted creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +0/+3 until end of turn and you gain 1 life.

name: Gorilla Berserkers
oracle_text:
Trample; rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked, it gets +2/+2 until end of turn for each creature blocking it beyond the first.)
Gorilla Berserkers can't be blocked except by three or more creatures.
flavor_text:
"Their fury is their greatest weapon."
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Gorilla Chieftain
oracle_text: {1}{G}: Regenerate Gorilla Chieftain.
flavor_text:
"Oh, no—not *you* again?!"
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Gorilla Shaman
oracle_text: {X}{X}{1}: Destroy target noncreature artifact with mana value X.
flavor_text:
"Frankly, destruction is best left to professionals."
—Jaya Ballard, Task Mage

name: Gorilla War Cry
oracle_text:
Cast this spell only during combat before blockers are declared.
All creatures gain menace until end of turn. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)
Draw a card at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"The only 'art' these beasts possess is the art of noise!"
—Jaya Ballard

name: Guerrilla Tactics
oracle_text:
Guerrilla Tactics deals 2 damage to any target.
When a spell or ability an opponent controls causes you to discard Guerrilla Tactics, Guerrilla Tactics deals 4 damage to any target.

name: Insidious Bookworms
oracle_text: When Insidious Bookworms dies, you may pay {1}{B}. If you do, target player discards a card at random.

name: Kjeldoran Escort
oracle_text: Banding (Any creatures with banding, and up to one without, can attack in a band. Bands are blocked as a group. If any creatures with banding you control are blocking or being blocked by a creature, you divide that creature's combat damage, not its controller, among any of the creatures it's being blocked by or is blocking.)
flavor_text:
"We willingly trade with Kjeldor, but the peace we build must come from both our lands."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Kjeldoran Pride
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+2.
{2}{U}: Attach Kjeldoran Pride to target creature other than enchanted creature.

name: Lat-Nam's Legacy
oracle_text: Shuffle a card from your hand into your library. If you do, draw two cards at the beginning of the next turn's upkeep.
flavor_text:
"Lat-Nam has bequeathed us its secrets. With them we shall attain true enlightenment."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Lim-Dûl's High Guard
oracle_text:
First strike
{1}{B}: Regenerate Lim-Dûl's High Guard.
flavor_text:
"The Guard will forever stand ready. For them, death is merely an inconvenience, not an ending."
—Chaeska, Keeper of Tresserhorn

name: Martyrdom
oracle_text: Until end of turn, target creature you control gains "{0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to target creature, planeswalker, or player this turn is dealt to this creature instead." Only you may activate this ability.
flavor_text:
"Martyrs are cheaper than mercenaries, and a far better investment."
—General Varchild

name: Noble Steeds
oracle_text: {1}{W}: Target creature gains first strike until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Only an animal born in the wild has sufficient heart to be a true Knight's steed."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Phantasmal Fiend
oracle_text:
{B}: Phantasmal Fiend gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
{1}{U}: Switch Phantasmal Fiend's power and toughness until end of turn.

name: Phyrexian Boon
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+1 as long as it's black. Otherwise, it gets -1/-2.
flavor_text:
"Phyrexia's touch is painful to all but the blackest of hearts."
—Gerda Äagesdotter, Archmage of the Unseen

name: Phyrexian War Beast
oracle_text: When Phyrexian War Beast leaves the battlefield, sacrifice a land and Phyrexian War Beast deals 1 damage to you.
flavor_text:
"Deal with the spawn of Phyrexia cautiously; only with time may we control them."
—Arcum Dagsson, Soldevi Machinist

name: Reinforcements
oracle_text: Put up to three target creature cards from your graveyard on top of your library.
flavor_text:
"We aided the Balduvians once before. They need but ask and we shall do so again."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Reprisal
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with power 4 or greater. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text:
"The meek shall fight as one, and they shall overcome even the greatest of foes."
—Halvor Arensson, Kjeldoran Priest

name: Royal Herbalist
oracle_text: {2}, Exile the top card of your library: You gain 1 life.
flavor_text:
"Just as an Herbalist heals a wound, so must we heal the rift between Balduvia and Kjeldor."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Soldevi Adnate
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice a black or artifact creature: Add an amount of {B} equal to the sacrificed creature's mana value.
flavor_text:
"People love to follow fools; they don't feel so alone then."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Heretic
oracle_text: {W}, {T}: Prevent the next 2 damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn. Target opponent may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"In the arms of tragedy, there is little comfort in being right."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Sage
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice two lands: Draw three cards, then discard one of them.
flavor_text:
"To hide the truth is more than folly—it is fatal."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Sentry
oracle_text: {1}: Choose target opponent. Regenerate Soldevi Sentry. When it regenerates this way, that player may draw a card.
flavor_text:
"A dreadful invention. What ease is there under the watchful eye of cold steel?"
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Soldevi Steam Beast
oracle_text:
Whenever Soldevi Steam Beast becomes tapped, target opponent gains 2 life.
{2}: Regenerate Soldevi Steam Beast.
flavor_text:
"Dagsson saw the steam as life-giving—until his followers felt its scalding touch."
—Sorine Relicbane, Soldevi Heretic

name: Stench of Decay
oracle_text: Nonartifact creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Disa is dead, and I am left. I shall allow no others to succumb to this pestilence."
—Kolbjörn, High Honored Druid

name: Storm Crow
oracle_text: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)
flavor_text:
"It tells you that the worst is coming. Do you listen?"
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Storm Shaman
oracle_text: {R}: Storm Shaman gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"Let the lightning be your warning, and the thunder your battle cry."
—Lovisa Coldeyes, Balduvian Chieftain

name: Swamp Mosquito
oracle_text:
Flying
Whenever Swamp Mosquito attacks and isn't blocked, defending player gets a poison counter. (A player with ten or more poison counters loses the game.)

name: Taste of Paradise
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {1}{G} any number of times.
You gain 3 life plus an additional 3 life for each additional {1}{G} you paid.
flavor_text:
"Any who drink of Freyalise's bounty drink the mead of rebirth."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order

name: Undergrowth
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, you may pay {2}{R}.
Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. If this spell's additional cost was paid, this effect doesn't affect combat damage that would be dealt by red creatures.
flavor_text:
"It is the work of sorcery. Burn it!"
—Taaveti of Kelsinko, Elvish Hunter

name: Varchild's Crusader
oracle_text: {0}: Varchild's Crusader can't be blocked this turn except by Walls. Sacrifice Varchild's Crusader at the beginning of the next end step.
flavor_text:
"We could have peace, but Varchild would rather have the maps of the new Kjeldor drawn in Balduvian blood."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Veteran's Voice
oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
Tap enchanted creature: Target creature other than the creature tapped this way gets +2/+1 until end of turn. Activate only if enchanted creature is untapped.
flavor_text:
"Good soldiers rely first upon their training, then upon their instincts."
—King Darien of Kjeldor

name: Viscerid Armor
oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1.
{1}{U}: Return Viscerid Armor to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: A fallen Viscerid's only tribute is to be worn by a comrade.

name: Whip Vine
oracle_text:
Defender; reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)
You may choose not to untap Whip Vine during your untap step.
{T}: Tap target creature with flying blocked by Whip Vine. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's untap step for as long as Whip Vine remains tapped.

name: Wild Aesthir
oracle_text:
Flying, first strike
{W}{W}: Wild Aesthir gets +2/+0 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
flavor_text:
"High in the Karplusans, death is swift and razor-clawed."
—Arna Kennerüd, Skycaptain

name: Yavimaya Ancients
oracle_text: {G}: Yavimaya Ancients gets +1/-2 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
"The Ancients teach us that if we can but last, we shall prevail."
—Kaysa, Elder Druid of the Juniper Order
